thread.title: Street of Russian Embassy in D.C. gets new name: Boris Nemtsov Plaza

title: Street of Russian Embassy in D.C. gets new name: Boris Nemtsov Plaza

organizations.name: boris nemtsov plaza street of russian embassy

text:
Street of Russian Embassy in D.C. gets new name: Boris Nemtsov Plaza 12:13am GMT - 01:34 
A one-block section of the street outside the Russian embassy in Washington was renamed on Tuesday after the late Kremlin critic Boris Nemtsov who was slain in Moscow in 2015. Nathan Frandino reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A one-block section of the street outside the Russian embassy in Washington was renamed on Tuesday after the late Kremlin critic Boris Nemtsov who was slain in Moscow in 2015. Nathan Frandino reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2CLkgwP
